item.description:
Annual Pig Roast Picnic / Party

Saturday, July 21, 2007, 1:00 PM - ???
Where: John K.'s Private Residence in Ellington, CT 06029.

festivities start at 1PM

* Beer
* Volley ball..... (day time and under the lights!)
* Bocce
* Horse Shoes
* Camp fire after dark
* Food
* Music
* Swimming at Crystal Lake if it gets too hot
* ........And of course.... a Pig!
* bring a "small" dish of something wonderful to share!
$10 per person to defer food, plumbing, and possible other expenses!
....... as always everyone gets leied!
(It will be a good excuse to wear your grass skirt)
John will have to have a cut off point for how many can attend.
After all it's only a little shack in the woods!

(Last time we had close to 100 people attend from only one singles group)
More details to follow!

>>> DIRECTIONS: will be emailed from John ONLY to those who RSVP "YES" DIRECTLY to John, (not just here). <<<

John Krajewski -
H- (860) 870-9750
C- (860) 550-4275
activehike@comcast.net

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: Singles PIG ROAST Picnic / Party - Ellington, CT
